page.title: 05PERSONALITIES
page.content: {GUEST OF HONOUR}- Mr. Harry Greenwood from Burnley was a special guest of honour at the VE day celebrations of Dunbar RNA and sea cadet unit TS Valiant.As a result of Worship Week collections, the people of East Lothian paid for the war time HMS Dunbar, Bangor Class minesweeper, which Mr. Greenwood once served on. { {KATHERINE'S OFF TO THE USA.-}The Head Girl of Dunbar Grammar School, 18-year-old Katherine Bailey from Stenton, has been chosen to represent Dunbar on an exchange to Dunbar's twin town,Martinez in the USA, this summer.The trip was originally planned to take place last summer,but had to be deferred due to a last minute hitch !.
